name: AIRDANCER
0:
”Alexa, open air dancer and practice electric slide”
”Alexa, open air dancer and show grapevine”
”Alexa, open air dancer and explain grapevine”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: air dancer
des:
There are three menus:
1 - Practice one of 5 popular line dances. For example, say "practice electric slide." Say "what are my options" for the list of dances.
2 - Practice the basic dance moves with 5 common dance terms. Try "show Grapevine." Say "what are the basics" for the list of dance terms. 
3 -,Learn the meaning of the basic dance terms shown in menu #2. Try "explain Grapevine."

Dance names can be referred to by using an identifying word from their names. For example, "practice boots" is the same as "practice These Old Boots."
Any dance can be practiced by Sections of 8 counts that can be repeated as many times as needed.
Say "what's the song for Shake" to get the name of the song recommended to use for the dance named "Shake Your Cake."
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
